admin-project.reset_projectvariables: Reset Project Variables to Default Values
admin-project.graycolourshows: Grey color shows the default values of the variables. You can replace them with your own values.
admin-project.title: Name
admin-project.listofprojects: You are on the page with a list of your projects. You can open existing projects by clicking on the project name, delete them, launch calculation or create a new project.
admin-project.countrieslistofprojects: You are on the page with a list of your projects. You can open existing projects by clicking on the project name, delete them or create a new project. You can propose your projects for calculations, but real launching will be made only by system administrator according to available resources and existing queue of similar requests.
admin-project.globallistofprojects: You are on the page with a list of your projects. You can open existing projects by clicking on the project name, delete them or create a new project. You can propose your projects for calculations, but real launching will be made only by system administrator according to available resources and existing queue of similar requests.
admin-project.sysadminlistofprojects: You are on the page with a list of your projects. You can open existing projects by clicking on the project name, delete them, launch calculation or create a new project.
admin-project.resultofcalcforproject: Result of calculation for the project
admin-project.no_invalid_objects: Congratulations, all objects are valid! You can start the calculation process.
admin-project.some_invalid_objects: Some objects are broken, but you can still start the calculation process.
admin-project.many_invalid_objects: Too many broken objects, you can't start the calculation process. Please fix them and re-upload the data.
admin-project.invalid_file_uploaded: You have a wrong file uploaded and can't continue the calculation process.
admin-project.topology_info: The Cellular and Satellite links are shown as 'virtual' connections to the base node (school that is chosen as 'base' via its distance to the existing point of presence of the broadband connection or by other criteria), but in the reality these connections could be implemented via the networks of cellular and/or satellite telecom operators and via global Internet and do not representing the real communication channels (in comparison with Fiber-optic or Microwave channels)
admin-project.download_simple_report: Download simple calculation report. This version of report will be working for major part of MS Excel versions, including old versions, but it does not allow to see changes in the best technology choosing 'on the fly'
admin-project.download_smart_report: Download smart calculation report. This version of report will be working only with the latest versions of MS Excel (starting from 2016), but it contains formulas that allow to see changes in the best technology choosing 'on the fly'

admin-project-status.waiting: This project is queued for calculation, but the calculation has not yet been started.
admin-project-status.stop: This project will be removed from the calculation queue as soon as possible, in-progress calculation will be canceled.
admin-project-status.not-calculated: This project has not been calculated and is not in the queue for calculation.
admin-project-status.in-progress: This project is in the process of calculation.
admin-project-status.data-ready: This project is approved for calculation, but not yet queued.
